com.fortify.util.spring.expression

Class SimpleExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortify.util.spring.expression.WrappedExpression
      • com.fortify.util.spring.expression.SimpleExpression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.expression.Expression

    public class SimpleExpression
extends WrappedExpression

    This is a simple wrapper class for a Spring Expression instance. It's main use is in combination with SimpleExpressionEditor to allow automatic conversion from String values to simple Expression instances.

    The reason for needing this wrapper class is to differentiate with templated Expression instances that are handled by TemplateExpressionEditor.
